name: Fairy Aura
summary: Increases the damage of Fairy moves by 1/3. Its effects are reversed by Aura Break.
viability: Xerneas has a gem of an ability here. Moonblast is a 95 base-powered move, and with Fairy Aura that increases to an outstanding 124. Combined with Geomancy and Xerneas's amazing Special Attack, that makes Moonblast an absolute terror.
